schedule.Description: The schedule associated with a export.

format.Description: The format of the export being delivered.

deliveryInfo.Description: The delivery information associated with a export.

status.Description: The status of the schedule. Whether active or not. If inactive, the export's scheduled execution is paused.

recurrencePeriod.Description: The start and end date for recurrence schedule.

destination.Description: The destination information for the delivery of the export.

resourceId.Description: The resource id of the storage account where exports will be delivered.

container.Description: The name of the container where exports will be uploaded.

rootFolderPath.Description: The name of the directory where exports will be uploaded.

timeframe.Description: The time frame for pulling data for the query. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

timePeriod.Description: The start and end date for pulling data for the query.

dataset.Description: The definition of data present in the query.

from.Description: The start date to pull data from.

to.Description: The end date to pull data to.

granularity.Description: The granularity of rows in the query.

configuration.Description: The configuration of dataset in the query.

aggregation.Description: Dictionary of aggregation expression to use in the query. The key of each item in the dictionary is the alias for the aggregated column. Query can have up to 2 aggregation clauses.

grouping.Description: Array of group by expression to use in the query. Query can have up to 2 group by clauses.

sorting.Description: Array of sorting by columns in query.

filter.Description: The filter expression to be used in the export.

columns.Description: Array of column names to be included in the query. Any valid query column name is allowed. If not provided, then query includes all columns.

name.Description: The name of the column to aggregate.

function.Description: The name of the aggregation function to use.

type.Description: The type of the column in the export.

name.Description: The name of the column to group.
The name of the column to use in sorting.

and.Description: The logical "AND" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

or.Description: The logical "OR" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

not.Description: The filter expression to be used in the export.

dimension.Description: The comparison expression to be used in the query.

tag.Description: The comparison expression to be used in the query.

name.Description: The name of the column to use in comparison.

operator.Description: The operator to use for comparison.

values.Description: Array of values to use for comparison
